hints: This 2022 Rom-Com movie revolves around religious boundaries.
Hero works in an ad agency and Heroine is a professional photographer.
They come from strict, orthodox families of different religions.
They tell 2 different lies to convince their own families.
Heroine dreams of having her wedding on Amelia Island.

details.Trivia: This film grossed over $1 million in the U.S, making it Nani's 7th film to do so.

hints: This 2016 thriller revolves around a mysterious kidnapping.
Hero is an NRI who returns to India after a call from his ex.
She asks his help to find her missing daughter.
Everyone insists the girl doesn’t even exist.
He later learns the girl is actually his own daughter.

details.Trivia: This film was officially remade in multiple languages, most notably in Hindi as Baaghi 2.

hints: This 2019 dark comedy-thriller revolves around three close friends.
The hero is a delivery boy struggling with money problems.
He tries to steal money from an old lady during a delivery.
He unexpectedly finds ₹10 lakhs in his delivery bags.
He gets stuck in a murder and drug case inside an apartment.

details.Trivia: The production used an actual retired police constable as a body double for Banerjee’s scenes.

hints: This 2010 romantic drama is about a hero who doesn’t believe in forever love.
He lives in Australia and he is a graffiti artist.
He falls for a girl who wants a lifelong relationship.
He shares his past love story with a police officer.
In the end, he realizes that sacrifice is a part of true love.

details.Trivia: The film was mostly shot in Australia with over 250 Australian cast and crew members.

hints: This 2010 action drama revolves around a mysterious illness spreading in a village.
Hero is a taxi driver who ends up in Rajasthan for an unexpected task.
Locals believe he is a godsent savior.
He finds out someone is secretly behind the sickness.
He fights back to save the villagers.

details.Trivia: The climax fight was shot in a single steadicam take lasting over 4 minutes.

hints: This 2021 drama revolves around farming.
Hero is a software engineer working in Hyderabad.
He quits his job to return to his village.
He faces resistance from his father.
He inspires youth to value agriculture.

details.Trivia: Sharwanand learned farming methods before shooting.

hints: This 2020 rom-com revolves around organic farming.
Hero is a meme creator with no clear goals.
He falls for a girl working in an organic company.
He becomes CEO for 30 days.
He exposes a dangerous chemical scam.

details.Trivia: The name Bheeshma appears more than 150 times in the movie.

hints: This 2014 thriller is about a man searching for answers about his childhood.
Hero is a rockstar.
Heroine is a news reporter.
He believes someone killed his parents.
He goes on a journey to uncover the truth.

details.Trivia: Reverse cuts were used to create psychological confusion.

hints: This 2012 love story follows a couple from school to adulthood.
They fall in love and fight repeatedly.
Hero is a software engineer.
Heroine becomes a teacher.
It focuses on misunderstandings and second chances.

details.Trivia: The film was shot simultaneously in Telugu and Tamil.

hints: This 2024 film is set in the far future.
Hero lives in the slums and takes risky jobs.
A pregnant woman is being hunted.
Someone protects her at great risk.
It blends future dystopia with Indian mythology.

details.Trivia: It was shot using the Arri Alexa 65 camera.

hints: This 2018 movie is about a young spy.
He wants to serve the country like his father.
He joins a secret agency.
He gets framed for an attack.
He uncovers the real culprits.
This 2015 movie is about a rich man helping a village.
Hero is the son of a businessman.
He visits a struggling village.
He stays to improve it.
He fights local criminals.

details.Trivia: Mahesh Babu adopted villages after this film.

hints: This 2018 film is about a gangster and a doctor becoming friends.
One is a don hiding from enemies.
One is a kind-hearted doctor.
They support each other.
They face crime and emotional struggles.

details.Trivia: Real guns were used in action scenes.

hints: This 2019 crime comedy is about three college boys.
They meet a girl controlled by her strict father.
Their escape plan goes wrong.
They get trapped in a kidnapping mess.
Parallel storytelling connects everything.

details.Trivia: Uses dual timelines that merge at the end.
